indexes.indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bets_pkey ON public.bets USING btree (id)

triggers.def: CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER "RI_ConstraintTrigger_c_17620" AFTER INSERT ON public.bets FROM matches NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION "RI_FKey_check_ins"()
CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER "RI_ConstraintTrigger_c_17621" AFTER UPDATE ON public.bets FROM matches NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION "RI_FKey_check_upd"()
CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER "RI_ConstraintTrigger_c_17625" AFTER INSERT ON public.bets FROM teams NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION "RI_FKey_check_ins"()
CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER "RI_ConstraintTrigger_c_17626" AFTER UPDATE ON public.bets FROM teams NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION "RI_FKey_check_upd"()
